statements: SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donation_id, donor_name FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2021-01-01' AND donation_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount < 5000 AND donor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount ASC, donation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS average_amount FROM donations
SELECT * FROM women_shelters;
SELECT name, capacity, location FROM women_shelters WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT donation_amount, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT shelter_id, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY shelter_id;
SELECT id, name, location, capacity FROM women_shelters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM women_shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM women_shelters WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND capacity >= 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 500 ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT name, location, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM women_shelters GROUP BY name, location ORDER BY total_capacity DESC;
SELECT shelter_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations JOIN women_shelters ON donations.shelter_id = women_shelters.id ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shelter_name, location, capacity FROM shelters ORDER BY shelter_name DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT distribution_id, shelter_name, location, distribution_date FROM distribution JOIN shelters ON distribution.shelter_id = shelters.shelter_id;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT d.*, s.shelter_name FROM donations d JOIN distribution dist ON d.donation_id = dist.donation_id JOIN shelters s ON dist.shelter_id = s.shelter_id;

SELECT d.donor_name, s.shelter_name, d.donation_amount FROM donations d JOIN distribution dist ON d.donation_id = dist.donation_id JOIN shelters s ON dist.shelter_id = s.shelter_id WHERE s.location = 'New York';
SELECT d.donor_name, sum(d.donation_amount) as total_donation FROM donations d GROUP BY d.donor_name HAVING total_donation > 5000 ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT shelter_name, location, capacity FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Food';
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_type, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_type, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT shelter_name, location, capacity FROM shelters ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, quantity FROM resources WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_type, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_type = 'Monetary' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM distribution WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 500;

SELECT distribution_id, shelter_name, resource_name, quantity_allocated FROM distribution JOIN shelters ON distribution.shelter_id = shelters.shelter_id JOIN resources ON distribution.resource_id = resources.resource_id;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 AND donation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT shelter_name, location, capacity FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location, capacity DESC;
SELECT resource_name, quantity, cost FROM resources WHERE quantity < 100 AND cost BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username;
